params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.instance_state
params.description: Instances in which state should be returned. Valid options are: 'ALL', 'RUNNING'. By default, it lists all instances. Check the InstanceState enum for the list of possible values.

params.name: data.port_name
params.description: Name of port user is interested in. It is optional. If it is set, only information about this ports will be returned. If it is not set, all the named ports will be returned. Always lists all instances.
